## DialogButtonCloseHook type

Hook function called when a button is clicked that determines whether the dialog should close or not. Useful for, e.g., popping up another dialog to confirm some change made in the first dialog.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DialogButtonCloseHook = (tag: string) => Promise<boolean>;
```
